name: iMASSAGE UE v2.0
description:
___________________________________________

iMASSAGE UE v2.0 is a deprecated version of iMASSAGE Gold Edition . 

This version will not be supported or updated. 

iMASSAGE Gold Edition is this most up to date version of iMASSAGE and has lifetime updates, this version is provided as is.

This version is made available as it may still suit some users needs at a reduced price.

If you are interested in the most up to date version with free lifetime updates please check out iMASSAGE Gold Edition!

iMASSAGE Gold Edition on Itch comes with a key for iMASSAGE on Steam too! ___________________________________________

iMASSAGE UE v2.0 is a FREE app that turns your Xbox One, Xbox 360, PlayStation 4 or any* gamepad into your own handheld massager!

___________________________________________

UE v2.0 Features:

 _

10 Simultaneous Gamepad Support

Use up to ten gamepads at once! Play alone, with your friends or have a party! 

 _

True Always On Massage Pattern

No gaps between massaging, pattern 1 is truly always on!

 _

Wireless Gamepad Support

No need for cords! No more USB cords falling out while in use! No more getting tangled in cords. Be free and use your gamepads wireless via Bluetooth! 

_

On Screen Controls

Control your gamepads all on the screen! No need to use the gamepad to change massage patterns, strengths or modes, everything can be done on the screen! 

(Not available in the iMASSAGE UE v2.0 Demo)

 _

Minimised Play

Use your gamepads wherever and whenever you want. No need to have the app on screen to use your gamepads. All gamepads will work while the app is minimised! 

 _

Simplified Display

No getting confused about which gamepad you're controlling! Clicking any button on your gamepad will show you everything you need to know in an instant!

 _

PS4 Battery Indicator

With the battery level on screen and a handy red flash of the PS4 gamepads lightbar to indicate to you that your gamepad is low on battery, you will never have to worry about your gamepad stopping during use! 

(Not available in the iMASSAGE UE v2.0 Demo & not supported on Linux)

 _

PS4 Lightbar Flash Integration

Turn iMASSAGE into a light show with the PS4 lightbar flashing to the beat of the massage! If that's not your thing you can always have just the lightbar on or competently off, its up to you! 

(Not available in the iMASSAGE UE v2.0 Demo & not supported on Linux)

 _

Gamepad Name Recognition

Have more than one gamepad of the same type? No problem! iMASSAGE will name the gamepads so you know which gamepad you are using at all times!

 _

10 Massage Strengths

Full range of massage strengths!

 _

Linux Support

New to iMASSAGE is support for Linux!

 _

Lifetime Free Updates (Gold Edition)

If you are after lifetime free updates, make sure to check out iMASSAGE Gold Edition as this version, iMASSAGE UE v2.0 is the deprecated version and is provided as is!

 _

20 Total Massage Patterns

20 massage patterns! 

 _

3 Massage Modes

Rumble, vibrate or both allow you to customise the type of massage you want!

 _

Easy Controls

Controls right on the gamepad!

 _

Onscreen Controls Guide

Always know what to press when you need it!

_

Dual Locking System

Lock the gamepads via button press and/or with an on screen lock! Ensuring you never press an unwanted button during use.!

 _

Hot Swap Controllers

No need to restart the app when a controller is disconnected or when switching between different controllers! 

_

Available NOW for Windows, MacOS & Linux !

_

___________________________________________

iMASSAGE UE v2.0 Teaser Edition Includes 3 massage patterns, wireless gamepad support & single gamepad support for free! $FREE$ iMASSAGE UE Teaser Windows iMASSAGE UE Teaser MacOS iMASSAGE UE Teaser Linux

___________________________________________

iMASSAGE UE v2.0 Includes 20 massage patterns, ten simultaneous gamepad support, PS4 lightbar integration, wireless gamepad support & more! $3.49USD$ iMASSAGE UE Windows iMASSAGE UE MacOS iMASSAGE UE Linux

___________________________________________

*The massage functions and strength of this app vary depending on the controller used.*

*Other controllers outside of Xbox One, Xbox 360 & PS4 controllers may work but not guaranteed or tested.*

*Xbox controllers do not work on the MacOS version, however PS4 controllers do.*

*Nintendo Switch Pro & JoyCon gamepads are not compatible with this app*

___________________________________________

Be sure to check out the other apps and games Takeover Studios has to offer!

Follow Takeover Studios on Itch.io to keep up to date with all the new apps and games coming soon!
